caption:
Table 1. We use the Medium model for our modality-
agnostic variant (VATT-MA). For the experiments with 
modality-specific Transformers, we use the Small and Base 
models for the text and audio modalities, respectively, while 
varying the model sizes for the video modality. This re-
sults in 3 variants for the modality-specific video-audio-text 
backbones: Base-Base-Small (BBS), Medium-Base-Small 
(MBS), and Large-Base-Small (LBS).
